nodes.text: A Separatist holdout was located in the Citadel on the planet Lola Sayu during the Imperial Era.

The Separatist holdout was located on the Outer Rim world of Lola Sayu, in the Citadel prison. The garrison consisted of old battle droids and was led by a malfunctioning droid that was following its final directive.

After the Clone Wars ended with the Galactic Republic victorious over the Confederacy of Independent Systems and transformed into the Galactic Empire, various pockets of Separatist resistance remained, including a garrison on the Citadel prison on the planet Lola Sayu. Led by a malfunctioning, though sophisticated droid following its last directive from the Clone Wars, the droid adjusted its programming to allow a more wide-ranging definition of its targets, which resulted in it targeting all Force-sensitives. During this time, the droid kidnapped a Force-sensitive child and imprisoned them at the Citadel.
The Citadel Separatist holdout was mentioned in Knights of Fate, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2018.
